bills_engagement_counts_check.name: bills_engagement_counts_check
bills_engagement_counts_check.value:
"bills"."view_count" >= 0 AND "bills"."unique_viewers_count" >= 0 AND
        "bills"."comment_count" >= 0 AND "bills"."share_count" >= 0 AND
        "bills"."bookmark_count" >= 0 AND "bills"."vote_count_for" >= 0 AND
        "bills"."vote_count_against" >= 0 AND "bills"."vote_count_neutral" >= 0 AND
        "bills"."unique_viewers_count" <= "bills"."view_count"

county_bill_assents_deadline_check.name: county_bill_assents_deadline_check
county_bill_assents_deadline_check.value: "county_bill_assents"."deadline_date" IS NULL OR "county_bill_assents"."sent_to_governor_date" IS NULL OR "county_bill_assents"."deadline_date" >= "county_bill_assents"."sent_to_governor_date"

idx_parliamentary_sittings_recent_record.name: idx_parliamentary_sittings_recent_records
idx_parliamentary_sittings_recent_record.where: "parliamentary_sittings"."hansard_url" IS NOT NULL AND "parliamentary_sittings"."sitting_date" >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '90 days'

parliamentary_sittings_time_range_check.name: parliamentary_sittings_time_range_check
parliamentary_sittings_time_range_check.value: "parliamentary_sittings"."end_time" IS NULL OR "parliamentary_sittings"."start_time" IS NULL OR "parliamentary_sittings"."end_time" >= "parliamentary_sittings"."start_time"

idx_participation_audits_any_red_flag.name: idx_participation_audits_any_red_flag
idx_participation_audits_any_red_flag.where:
("participation_quality_audits"."participation_washing_detected" = true
      OR "participation_quality_audits"."elite_capture_detected" = true
      OR "participation_quality_audits"."timing_manipulation_detected" = true
      OR "participation_quality_audits"."post_hoc_amendments_detected" = true
      OR "participation_quality_audits"."access_barriers_detected" = true
      OR "participation_quality_audits"."procedural_irregularities_detected" = true
      OR "participation_quality_audits"."conflicts_of_interest_detected" = true)
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."audit_status" = 'published'

scores_range_check.name: scores_range_check
scores_range_check.value:
("participation_quality_audits"."participation_quality_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."participation_quality_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."timeline_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."timeline_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."accessibility_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."accessibility_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."inclusivity_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."inclusivity_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."response_quality_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."response_quality_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."process_integrity_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."process_integrity_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."geographic_coverage_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."geographic_coverage_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."notice_quality_score" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."notice_quality_score" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)

rates_range_check.name: rates_range_check
rates_range_check.value:
("participation_quality_audits"."incorporation_rate" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."incorporation_rate" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."acknowledgment_rate" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."acknowledgment_rate" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."analysis_rate" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."analysis_rate" BETWEEN 0 AND 100)

submissions_logic_check.name: submissions_logic_check
submissions_logic_check.value:
"participation_quality_audits"."total_submissions" >= 0
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."unique_participants" >= 0
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."unique_participants" <= "participation_quality_audits"."total_submissions"
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_acknowledged" >= 0
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_acknowledged" <= "participation_quality_audits"."total_submissions"
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_analyzed" >= 0
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_analyzed" <= "participation_quality_audits"."total_submissions"
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_incorporated" >= 0
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_incorporated" <= "participation_quality_audits"."total_submissions"
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_incorporated" <= "participation_quality_audits"."submissions_analyzed"

positive_counts_check.name: positive_counts_check
positive_counts_check.value:
("participation_quality_audits"."days_allocated" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."days_allocated" >= 0)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."minimum_days_required" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."minimum_days_required" >= 0)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."notice_days_given" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."notice_days_given" >= 0)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."counties_required" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."counties_required" >= 0)
      AND ("participation_quality_audits"."public_hearings_count" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."public_hearings_count" >= 0)
      AND "participation_quality_audits"."audit_version" > 0

dates_logic_check.name: dates_logic_check
dates_logic_check.value:
("participation_quality_audits"."participation_start_date" IS NULL OR "participation_quality_audits"."participation_end_date" IS NULL
      OR "participation_quality_audits"."participation_start_date" <= "participation_quality_audits"."participation_end_date")

elite_knowledge_scores_categories_check.name: elite_knowledge_scores_categories_check
elite_knowledge_scores_categories_check.value:
("elite_knowledge_scores"."constitutional_knowledge" IS NULL OR ("elite_knowledge_scores"."constitutional_knowledge" >= 0 AND "elite_knowledge_scores"."constitutional_knowledge" <= 100))
      AND ("elite_knowledge_scores"."institutional_powers" IS NULL OR ("elite_knowledge_scores"."institutional_powers" >= 0 AND "elite_knowledge_scores"."institutional_powers" <= 100))
      AND ("elite_knowledge_scores"."legislative_procedure" IS NULL OR ("elite_knowledge_scores"."legislative_procedure" >= 0 AND "elite_knowledge_scores"."legislative_procedure" <= 100))
      AND ("elite_knowledge_scores"."public_finance" IS NULL OR ("elite_knowledge_scores"."public_finance" >= 0 AND "elite_knowledge_scores"."public_finance" <= 100))
      AND ("elite_knowledge_scores"."rights_jurisprudence" IS NULL OR ("elite_knowledge_scores"."rights_jurisprudence" >= 0 AND "elite_knowledge_scores"."rights_jurisprudence" <= 100))

influence_networks_date_logic_check.name: influence_networks_date_logic_check
influence_networks_date_logic_check.value:
"influence_networks"."active_from" IS NULL OR "influence_networks"."active_to" IS NULL
      OR "influence_networks"."active_from" <= "influence_networks"."active_to"

moderation_queue_assignment_check.name: moderation_queue_assignment_check
moderation_queue_assignment_check.value: "moderation_queue"."assigned_to" IS NULL OR "moderation_queue"."assigned_at" IS NOT NULL

idx_user_verification_expiry.name: idx_user_verification_expiry
idx_user_verification_expiry.where: expires_at IS NOT NULL AND verification_status = 'verified'

appeal_review_board_decision_check.name: appeal_review_board_decision_check
appeal_review_board_decision_check.value: "appeal_review_board"."board_decision" IS NULL OR "appeal_review_board"."review_completed_at" IS NOT NULL

cib_detection_temporal_check.name: cib_detection_temporal_check
cib_detection_temporal_check.value: "cib_detections"."temporal_window_start" IS NULL OR "cib_detections"."temporal_window_end" IS NULL OR "cib_detections"."temporal_window_start" <= "cib_detections"."temporal_window_end"

idx_identity_verification_expiring.name: idx_identity_verification_expiring
idx_identity_verification_expiring.where:
"identity_verification"."iprs_expiry_date" IS NOT NULL
    AND "identity_verification"."iprs_expiry_date" < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '30 days'

idx_rate_limit_blacklist_active_threats.name: idx_rate_limit_blacklist_active_threats
idx_rate_limit_blacklist_active_threats.where: "rate_limit_blacklist"."is_active" = true AND ("rate_limit_blacklist"."expires_at" IS NULL OR "rate_limit_blacklist"."expires_at" > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

idx_rate_limit_whitelist_active.name: idx_rate_limit_whitelist_active
idx_rate_limit_whitelist_active.where: "rate_limit_whitelist"."is_active" = true AND ("rate_limit_whitelist"."expires_at" IS NULL OR "rate_limit_whitelist"."expires_at" > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

idx_rate_limit_whitelist_expiring.name: idx_rate_limit_whitelist_expiring
idx_rate_limit_whitelist_expiring.where: "rate_limit_whitelist"."expires_at" IS NOT NULL AND "rate_limit_whitelist"."expires_at" < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '7 days'

rate_limit_identifier_check.name: rate_limit_identifier_check
rate_limit_identifier_check.value: "rate_limits"."user_id" IS NOT NULL OR "rate_limits"."ip_address" IS NOT NULL OR "rate_limits"."device_fingerprint" IS NOT NULL

idx_reputation_scores_decay_eligible.name: idx_reputation_scores_decay_eligible
idx_reputation_scores_decay_eligible.where:
"reputation_scores"."last_contribution_date" IS NOT NULL
    AND ("reputation_scores"."last_decay_applied" IS NULL
    OR "reputation_scores"."last_decay_applied" < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '30 days')

safeguard_metrics_rates_check.name: safeguard_metrics_rates_check
safeguard_metrics_rates_check.value:
"safeguard_metrics"."false_positive_rate" >= 0 AND "safeguard_metrics"."false_positive_rate" <= 1
    AND "safeguard_metrics"."sla_violation_rate" >= 0 AND "safeguard_metrics"."sla_violation_rate" <= 1
    AND "safeguard_metrics"."appeal_overturn_rate" >= 0 AND "safeguard_metrics"."appeal_overturn_rate" <= 1
    AND "safeguard_metrics"."legitimate_blocks_percentage" >= 0 AND "safeguard_metrics"."legitimate_blocks_percentage" <= 1
    AND "safeguard_metrics"."verification_success_rate" >= 0 AND "safeguard_metrics"."verification_success_rate" <= 1

ambassadors_contact_method_check.name: ambassadors_contact_method_check
ambassadors_contact_method_check.value: "ambassadors"."contact_phone" IS NOT NULL OR "ambassadors"."contact_email" IS NOT NULL

idx_communities_access_characteristics.name: idx_communities_access_characteristics
idx_communities_access_characteristics.where: "communities"."internet_penetration" IS NOT NULL OR "communities"."smartphone_penetration" IS NOT NULL

campaigns_date_range_check.name: campaigns_date_range_check
campaigns_date_range_check.value: "campaigns"."target_end_date" IS NULL OR "campaigns"."launch_date" IS NULL OR "campaigns"."target_end_date" >= "campaigns"."launch_date"
